content: this is a pattern only and not a completed item > this pattern for all 25 squares is available for **free** on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains the full pattern in two printable files without advertisements **pattern description** 1 at less than a dollar per square you can learn all the basics of tunisian crochet 2 this blanket was designed primarily for teaching the basics of tunisian crochet the squares are in order of complexity and start with beginner level stitches leading into advanced beginner techniques towards the end the pattern for each square is available for free on my blog - scroll down for all links 3 the pdf pattern consists of 40 pages that include 25 squares and they are presented in increasing order of complexity if you are a beginner i recommend making them in the order they are mentioned in this document 4 the sizes of the squares might vary a little and that is okay the joining technique used to join the squares will mask the difference 5 pictures for each square are included in a separate document for your reference 6 this pattern is written in a way that each square can be made independently the joining and border instructions are mentioned at the end 7 **some squares in this pattern do not come with written instructions for all such squares there will be a video tutorial ** 8 **there are no written instructions for for the joining and border techniques that i have used in my blanket there are links to video tutorials that you can use to follow along and make yours ** 9 the pattern with only 16 beginner level squares is available for purchase here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tunisian-sampler-blanket-cal-16-squares **facebook group** to connect with other people who have made this blanket join the knitterknotter hangout group on facebook 4 **skill level** 16 squares - beginner 9 squares - intermediate **sizes** 45 x 45 adjustable **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with **@knitterknotter #knitterknotter #tunisiansamplerblanketcal** for a chance to get featured in my stories **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- these squares were a part of a cal i hosted in 2020 here are the details of the cal **cal introduction** i picked up tunisian crochet about 2 years ago and it has been a great learning experience for me i have learnt so many stitches and techniques and i am always amazed by how much it has to offer i am learning something new every day this blanket cal is my attempt to build a blanket
